channel.title: Ideas Needed {check this out}
channel.description:
Hi people of Mopar, I was really bored one day and decided to post this on here, I dont know if this is where it should go but this is the only place I can think that it belongs.
I am wanting to make a website that will help people with Anything related to RSPS, HTML, Programming, [PI] Interface making services, RSBuddy Bot making service, C#, C++, Java Script, and Much much more. And I am not talking about making tutorials for people im talking about Services and Help services. So please dont comment saying "Just post them on here" because making tutorials I will put some on the site but it's Mostly a Service thing unless you can help me with better Ideas! :)
I know alot of launguages when it comes to computers and I am only 16, Me and my friend want to make a site for services and more but need some ideas to get us some inspiration! If you have any Ideas or would like to help let me know Thanks!!!
If your idea is an amazing idea I will Rep++ you!!!

[quote=“OmgItsShane, post:3, topic:393846”]Community, Maybe a Status list would be nice. A one that goes by Uptime so new servers can thrive. It will make your community/Website more popular for Advertising.[/quote]yeah good point

item.title: Ideas Needed {check this out}
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You could make your own community, but good luck getting it around to others.

[hr]

Also, mendorphins already has a “archive” of various tutorials he is working on.

Read full topic
